channel.title: BMDM Server Admins Sound Off
channel.description:
This thread has three purposes:
First - Lets see how many people are going to start up a BMDM Server when BM is released. Do you have a server name in mind? Any specific plans for what you are going to do with the server?
Second - I'd like to start a petition at gameservers.com to get BMDM added to their game list. They said if enough demand is shown for a game, they'll add it to their list. Shortly before the release of BM, I'd like to make a post on their forums to petition for the addition of BMDM. I'd like this thread to be the organization point for that effort. Please don't post there until we have a concrete release date.
Third - Once BM is released, let's use this thread to annouce new BMDM servers.
I'll start:
[COLOR='Red']Server: Degeneration Station Admins: Degenatron & Oldman Merlin Type: Custom High Quality Maps mixed with Original BMDM Maps Special Notes: 16 Players, Realistic Fall Damage ON, Fraglimit 50

item.title: BMDM Server Admins Sound Off
item.dc:creator: func_random
item.description:
They are saying, “Are you going to host a server for people to play Black Mesa Deathmatch, and if so, what will it be called and what are the rules?”
Dong ma?

I will host if I can get some more thermal paste from a friend to fix my server computer so I’ll post back when I get it running.

Read full topic

item.title: BMDM Server Admins Sound Off
item.dc:creator: Degenatron
item.description:
This thread has three purposes:

First - Lets see how many people are going to start up a BMDM Server when BM is released. Do you have a server name in mind? Any specific plans for what you are going to do with the server?

Second - I’d like to start a petition at gameservers.com to get BMDM added to their game list. They said if enough demand is shown for a game, they’ll add it to their list. Shortly before the release of BM, I’d like to make a post on their forums to petition for the addition of BMDM. I’d like this thread to be the organization point for that effort. Please don’t post there until we have a concrete release date.

Third - Once BM is released, let’s use this thread to annouce new BMDM servers.
